articles.title: The new vaccines and you: Americans better armed than ever against the winter blechs - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Last year's "triple-demic" marked the beginning of what may be a new normal: a confluence of respiratory infections — RSV, influenza, and covid-19 — will surge as the weather cools each year.

articles.title: Young women get lung cancer at higher rates than men — docs don't know why - New York Post
articles.description: While the disparity is slim, researchers at the American Cancer Society believe it’s a big enough discrepancy that it should be looked into.
articles.content:
Younger women are getting lung cancer at higher rates than men — and researchers can’t figure out why.
